name: New Zealand Ocean Data Network (NZODN)
description: A collaborative online initiative gathering open-access marine datasets from around New Zealand in an organised way, making these data freely available for science and stewardship. The portal follows international standards and agreements for data/metadata formatting, discovery and sharing, and integrates with the Australian Ocean Data Network (AODN) and the World Ocean Database (WOD).
owner_name: Te Tini a Tangaroa (supported by multiple organisations e.g. NIWA, Cawthron Institute, MetOcean)
